original: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
analyzed: avassutāya bhikkhuniyāḥ avassutassa purisa puggalassa kāya sasaggam sādiyantiyāḥ āpattiyaḥ sattannam samathānam katihi samathehi

original: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
analyzed: avassutāya bhikkhuniyāḥ avassutassa purisa puggalassa kāya sasaggam sādiyantiyāḥ āpattiyaḥ sattannam samathānam tīhi samathehi

original: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe….
analyzed: siyā sammukhā vinayena ca paṭiññāta karaṇena ca siyā sammukhā vinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca pe

original: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
analyzed: dadhim viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyāḥ āpattiyaḥ sattannam samathānam katihi samathehi

original: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
analyzed: dadhim viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyāḥ āpattiyaḥ sattannam samathānam tīhi samathehi

original: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
analyzed: siyā sammukhā vinayena ca paṭiññāta karaṇena ca siyā sammukhā vinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca
